title: Pregnant by the Greek Tycoon
description: All the Greek tycoon wants is...his child.After a whirlwind marriage to Greek billionaire Angolos Constantine, Georgie was pregnant -- and was sure Angolos would be delighted. Instead, he told her to "go away and never come back." So that was exactly what she did. Angolos has never seen his son -- until now!In fact, Angolos Constantine didn't think he could have children, and now he's not prepared to let this miracle go. Even though Georgie seems to hate him, he'll have what's rightfully his...by whatever means possible!
author: Kim Lawrence
